code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import"./AddNote.css";function AddNote(props){var titleRef=useRef("");var textRef=useRef("");var dateRef=useRef("");var now=new Date();function submitHandler(event){event.preventDefault();var notes={title:titleRef.current.value,text:textRef.current.value,date:now.toLocaleString()};props.AddNote(notes);titleRef.current.value="";textRef.current.value="";}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:submitHandler},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"control"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"title"},"Title"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",id:"title",ref:titleRef,style:{color:"white"},placeholder:"Log the title here..!"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"control"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:"text-log"},"Text Log"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("textarea",{rows:"5",id:"text-log",ref:textRef,style:{color:"white"},placeholder:"Log the things that you wanna say.."})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",null,"Submit"));}export default AddNote;
